item.title: Docker tips
item.description: 1. Containers Ubuntu 18.04 docker run -p 8000:8000 -v e:/gohome:/gohome -it --name test ubuntu bash Apache 2.4 docker run -dit --name web -p 8080:80 -v E:/webhome/:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/ httpd:2.4 MariaDB 10.
